results.title: No maps on my taps
results.brief_description: A tribute to jazz tap dancing as an expression of black heritage and culture through the portraits of three surviving dancers - Sandman Sims, Chuck Green and Bunny Briggs - combined with rare photos and film clips from the thirties, the heyday of tap. Contains B&W sequences.

results.title: No man of her own
results.brief_description: Clark Gable and Carole Lombard were one of Hollywood’s legendary couples, but unlike Bogart and Bacall, they only made one film together. Babe Stewart (Clark Gable) is a big time card shark, forced to hide in a small mid-western town where he meets Connie Randall (Carole Lombard), the local librarian whom he marries on a bet. Her innocence and sincerity act as a foil to his sauveness and eventually he is reformed by goodness and love. Co-starring Dorothy MacKaill.

results.title: Just one of the boys
results.creator_credit: Mike Mahoney, Ted Haley and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A profile of Eric Davidson, who has been totally blind since the age of two, a victim of the 1917 Halifax explosion. Despite his blindness, Mr. Davidson has spent the past twenty years as a full-time automotive mechanic for the city of Halifax. He is actively involved in the restoration and rebuilding of antique cars and is a well known member of the Antique Car Club.

results.title: Allan's "Westella"
results.creator_credit: Bob Barber, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The sad occassion of the sale of the beloved family farm “Westella” gives Bob Barber cause to reflect on the times there. It was at “Westella” that Barber learnt many things about running farm, and where he could always get a feed.

results.title: No man's land = Nikogarsnja zemlja
results.creator_credit: Danis Tanovic, Cedomir Kolar, Frederique Dumas-Zajdela, Marc Baschet, Casablanca, Studio Maj, Noe Productions, Man's Films and Fabrica Films
results.brief_description: Written and directed by Danis Tanovic, “No man’s land” is an anti-war satire set in 1993, amid the Bosnian Serb war. A group of Bosnian soldiers advance toward Serbian lines in heavy fog; when day breaks they are clearly visible and massacred with the exception of Chiki, who runs to the nearest trench. When the Serbian troop responsible decide to investigate the outcome, only Nino, a novice soldier, survives the mission, and is now trapped in the same trench as Chiki. As the two men trade insults, the power shifts continuously between them and their situation is further complicated by the fact that Chiki has laid a tripped mine under the body of a Serbian soldier, Cera, who as it turns out, is still alive. A solution of kinds presents itself when the United Nations Peacekeeping force intervenes attempting to diffuse the standoff. When an English journalist cottons on to the ensuing drama, she seeks to attain a scoop for the network, which involves deal making and subterfuge. The tragedy of the war, and misfortune of these unfortunate three - a powerful allegory for the state of warfare - is underpinned by a bitterly absurd humour that permeates this thought-provoking and intelligent film that ponders the corruptibility of the UN, journalistic ethics and the futility of combat.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Danis Tanovic, Cedomir Kolar, Frederique Dumas-Zajdela, Marc Baschet, Casablanca, Studio Maj, Noe Productions, Man’s Films and Fabrica Films

results.title: See me
results.brief_description: Catherine delves into the mind of a lady, once independent but now forced to adjust to a life of restriction and questions of a personal nature. This story touches on the universal need to be seen as a person, still full of life and potential, rather than a problem.

results.title: Nihiwatu
results.creator_credit: Christiana Stergiou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: On the remote Indonesian island of Sumba is the village of Nihiwatu, a place that can only be found in the Ethical Travel Guide. It was here that Christiana Stergiou discovered her utopia, and a place that, despite being a seasoned traveller, she will never forget.
